headline: NAZIS WELCOME: House GOP leader promises reward for racist Representatives
author: Thomas Kennedy
sentences: Kevin McCarthy promised his Republican colleagues Greene and Gosar the “ability” to affect legislation again by giving them back their committee assignments next year, after being ingloriously stripped of their seats this past year due to their previously unhinged behavior and threats which are beneath the dignity of a United States Member of Congress.

The failure to deliver any sort of repercussion for GOP Reps. Greene and Gosar conferencing with neo-Nazis are outrageous considering that minority leader McCarthy has threatened to strip committee assignments from any Republican who participates in the special committee investigating the January 6th riots.

Here’s a video of mealy-mouthed Kevin McCarthy saying anything to get out of a press conference:
Here's where we're at in 2022: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy says he talked to Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) about not attending any *more* white nationalist conferences.

Rep. Greene in the past blamed wildfires in California on “Jewish space lasers”, suggested Muslims should not be involved in the U.S. government, and said that those supporting refugees are using “immigrant pawns” to commit “the biggest genocide in human history”.

Supposed Republican party leaders like McCarthy have a responsibility – if such a thing exists in the former “Party of Personal Responsibility” – to intervene when members of his caucus ally themselves with literal neo-nazis and racists.

We recently wrote about pariah members of Congress, Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), and Paul Gosar’s (R-AZ) appearances at the American First Political Action Conference, an event organized by neo-nazis and white nationalists.
